```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(extera)
library(yyjsonr)

tera <- ExTera$new("extera-templates/*.html")
tera$autoescape_off()
```

## Manuscripts

```{r}
#| label: manuscripts
manuscripts <- read_json_file("data/manuscript.json")

string <- tera$render_to_string(
  "manuscripts.html",
  id = "manuscripts",
  bibliography = manuscripts
)

cat("```{=html}", string, "```", sep = "\n")
```
